title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: Everyone in the crypto world is feeling crazy about NFTs. Multiple academies/influencers are educating people about NFTs and letting them know how they can earn from them.To drive this effort further, AdLunam has recently announced the series 'The Future of NFTs'. This time Mieke Marple, Co-Founder of NFT Tuesday LA is joining the AdLunam Team to discuss all things NFTs.Join them tomorrow at 3 PM CET on Twitter spaces.https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1eaKbNrnMnaKXSee you there!
